org.workflowsim

Class WorkflowParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.workflowsim.WorkflowParser

  • public class WorkflowParser
extends java.lang.Object
    WorkflowParser parse a DAX into tasks so that WorkflowSim can manage them
    Since:
    WorkflowSim Toolkit 1.0
